item.title: Erlang Finite State Machine
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Finite State Machines (FSMs) are a crucial concept in computer science and software development, providing a robust method for modeling the behavior of systems.

item.title: Labs Weekly Catchup #5

item.description: Event Date Discord Channel Type 03/01/2024 üçé apple Internal Our fifth weekly catchup. We organize an agenda the day beforehand and consolidate our findings, notable research progress, possibly new tech, insight or technique everyone should know.
